name: Dominium
storyline:
Alan Levi, a Time Agent, work for an organization with no name that has the goal of time improvement. His work consists of using the time machine called “Dominium” and putting himself into a loop to disrupt anomalies or modify history for the better.

Back from a mission, Alan, receives an urgent call, a time anomaly caused the death of the time travel creator. Alan got infinite trys to complete the mission, and the best way to accomplish it? That depends on his judgment….
summary: In Dominium, you take on the role of a temporal agent tasked with preventing a time anomaly: a train explosion that will lead to the death of the man destined to invent the time machine. Utilize your investigative skills, navigate intricate time loops, and unravel the mystery behind this catastrophic event.
